item.title: Version 1.1.20
item.description: What’s New: 1. Improved sorting logic in Top Deals & Deal breakdowns 2. Consistent number formatting across pages 3. Updated Global Map Total value logic 4. Deal status configuration applied on Deal Page 5. IOT rates now show 3 decimals 6. Bug fixes: Top Deal Cost filter & Walkthrough button
